message.body: I got your check today, but I noticed that you didn't sign it. Is it all right if I put your name on it?
Oh,im so sorry. I must in a hurry and forgot, I'll mail out a new one today. So sorry
Oh, yes please sign it for me
Uh...Okay, I'll sign it and deposit it sometime this week then.
Thanks for your help. I really appreciate it.
Please let me know if you need anything else.
I'll be sure to do so. Thank you.
I just went to the post office and mail out another one. Please let me know if there's any other error (hoping not). And again I'm so sorry for that.
